name: Nothing is ordinary
description: Our passion for decoration turns our hotel rooms in various sizes into small treasures. In every room there is a new design to discover with the same standard - good box spring beds, furniture, shower rooms and TV. The pictures are sample pictures for 8 different double rooms in our hotel in the backyard of a typical Berlin apartment building.
neighborhood_overview: There is a tram stop right in front of the building. The tram takes you to Alexanderplatz or the Ringbahn in just a few minutes. The Volkspark Friedrichshain is only 5 minutes away. This relaxed area is characterized by many cafes, restaurants and nice little shops.
host_about:
Our hotel in a typical Berlin building with its beautifully designed rooms is located in the city center of Berlin. Even with this central location our guests appreciate the tranquility of the courtyard location. Our passion for decoration transform the 24 rooms of various sizes into little treasures. There is a new design to discover in each room however with the same standard - good beds, furniture, bathrooms with shower and TV. Relax after a busy day of sightseeing. Enjoy the summer in our garden or even have your breakfast there. Our breakfast (bookable separately) offers fresh fruit, home-made bread spreads, baked cakes, sausage and cheese platters, bread and rolls and a variety of desserts, tea, coffee and orange juice.

If you are coming to Berlin and looking for ideas how to spend your time, make sure to check out our Neighbourhood-Guide to find inspiration for your stay (You'll also get a free map at check-in!).

Above our hotel we do offer 5 lovely apartments for longer stays. These are still brand new. 

We are looking forward to your visit!
